thread.title: Keller Animal Paintings By Anonymous Artist Vandalized
thread.title_full: Keller Animal Paintings By Anonymous Artist Vandalized

author: CBS Dallas / Fort Worth
title: Keller Animal Paintings By Anonymous Artist Vandalized
text:
KELLER (CBSDFW.COM) – The City of Keller says the animal paintings from an anonymous artist that were drawn in the Bear Creek Parkway tunnel were vandalized and had to be painted over. (Credit: City of Keller) 
The news was broken on the City of Keller’s Facebook page with pictures of the original paintings that the community “was enjoying so much.” (credit: City of Keller) 
The paintings were of birds, an armadillo, a turtle and a deer. (credit: City of Keller) 
When the paintings were spotted this month, city leaders were calling to meet the artist who drew the animals and to potentially agree on work for a mural in the tunnel. (credit: City of Keller)
